attributes.action:
STOP THE STIGMA TOWARDS PCOS AND ENDOMETRIOSIS .
LISTEN , UNDERSTAND , HELP !
attributes.additional_details:
For years we battle, cry and fight for someone to believe our symptoms. I myself have been blamed for my own health . Judged by eye not by ear. 
Its insulting,  degrading and disgusting. 
Endometriosis is a silent disease that causes lives to be ruined.
PCOS not only affects our outside but our insides. 
Mental health is left  demolished by these conditions yet everyday women walk around suffering in pain. 
Now is the time to end decades of agony.
More research , More understanding, More care
attributes.background:
I , along with millions of women suffer everyday with  long term debilitating conditions PCOS and Endometriosis.  
It is disgusting that it takes up to 10 years for many many women to get diagnosed. 
Give these women a voice . A voice that will be believed not judged or neglected. End the agony.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to request the Government or House of Commons take a specific action, and we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you'd like more funding for research into endometriosis, you might like to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328570
